title: Prism Medical P300 and C300 ceiling hoist (TGA - Therapeutic Goods Administration)
text: ( Source : TGA - Therapeutic Goods Administration ) Consumers and health professionals are advised that Rehab Assist, in consultation with the TGA, is recallingall Prism Medical P300 and C300 ceiling hoists manufactured before 8 June 2015 (see
